title: Wanted T206 Joe Doyle EPDG & Tolstoi
author: nodgrass

posts.post_title: Wanted T206 Joe Doyle EPDG & Tolstoi
posts.post_content: Wanted T206 Joe Doyle EPDG & Tolstoi backs.  Condition range: unaltered fair to vg+, graded or ungraded.  Depending on degree of severity,  paper loss on front or reverse might be an issue.  Please send a message to my mailbox with any opportunities. Thanks
